subject: $59.95 Adobe Dreamweaver CS3
body:
Fortune favors the bold, but abandons the timid.

Creativity can solve almost any problem. The creative act, the defeat of habit by originality, overcomes everything.

You can't create experience. You must undergo it.

The empire of custom is most mighty.

I think, therefore I am is the statement of an intellectual who underrates toothaches.

Action itself, so long as I am convinced that it is right action, gives me satisfaction.

Promise, large promise, is the soul of an advertisement.

The old know what they want the young are sad and bewildered.

The moment of enlightenment is when a person's dreams of possibilities become images of probabilities.

The wrath of brothers is fierce and devilish.

Proper names are poetry in the raw. Like all poetry they are untranslatable.

Beware of silent dogs and still waters.

The Goddamn human race deserves itself, and as far as I'm concerned it can have it.
